below.raw:
<script>
  $( '.block' ).each(function() {
    var distance = $(this).offset().top;    
    var block = $(this);
    
    function fadeUp() {
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.2 ) {
          block.find('.heading').addClass('is-visible')
      }
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.3 ) {
          block.find('.subheading').addClass('is-visible')
      }
    }
    
    $(window).scroll(function() {
      fadeUp();    
    });
  });
  fadeUp();
</script>￰
below.final:
<script>
  $( '.block' ).each(function() {
    var distance = $(this).offset().top;    
    var block = $(this);
    
    function fadeUp() {
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.2 ) {
          block.find('.heading').addClass('is-visible')
      }
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.3 ) {
          block.find('.subheading').addClass('is-visible')
      }
    }
    
    $(window).scroll(function() {
      fadeUp();    
    });
  });
  fadeUp();
</script>￰
